# Task Manager CLI

## Usage

- `add <title> --data <path>`: Add a new task.
- `list --data <path>`: List all tasks.
- `done <id> --data <path>`: Mark a task as done.
- `remove <id> --data <path>`: Remove a task.
- `--help`: Show help information.
